data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,127,000 souls living in the county of Sidhi with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,100,929 who are far from you in Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 12,397 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, we ask for 225 new simple churches in the county of Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,127,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Pao people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 12,397 believers living in Sidhi, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
